// import React from 'react'; // import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; const CourseSection = () => { const courses = [ { title: "Full-Stack Web Development", description: "Master both front-end and back-end technologies to build complete web applications. Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and database integration.", duration: "12 Weeks", startDate: "Starts Jun 1", image: "images/web3.png", price: "¥350,000", category: "Web Development" }, { title: "Data Science & Analytics", description: "Learn to analyze and interpret complex data sets using Python, R, SQL, and visualization tools. Includes machine learning fundamentals and real-world projects.", duration: "16 Weeks", startDate: "Starts May 15", image: "images/data3.png", price: "¥420,000", category: "Data Science" }, { title: "Cybersecurity Fundamentals", description: "Develop essential skills in network security, ethical hacking, threat detection, and security management. Includes preparation for industry certifications.", duration: "14 Weeks", startDate: "Starts Jul 10", image: "images/cyber2.png", price: "¥380,000", category: "Cybersecurity" }, { title: "Cloud Architecture & Solutions", description: "Master cloud infrastructure deployment, management, and scaling using AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud. Learn containerization, microservices, and cloud security best practices.", duration: "10 Weeks", startDate: "Starts Jun 15", image: "images/cloud1.png", price: "¥365,000", category: "Cloud Computing" }, { title: "Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning", description: "Explore AI concepts, algorithms, and practical applications. Build neural networks, implement machine learning models, and develop solutions for real-world business challenges.", duration: "18 Weeks", startDate: "Starts Jul 5", image: "images/ai1.png", price: "¥450,000", category: "Artificial Intelligence" }, { title: "Internet of Things (IoT) Development", description: "Learn to design, build, and deploy connected smart devices and systems. Master sensor integration, embedded programming, data collection, and IoT security fundamentals.", duration: "14 Weeks", startDate: "Starts Aug 3", image: "images/iot1.png", price: "¥395,000", category: "Internet of Things" } ]; return (
